sentence: Washington (CNN)A lawyer for embattled GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn argued Tuesday in federal court that states can't enforce basic age or residency requirements for congressional candidates, let alone enforce a constitutional ban against insurrectionists from holding office.
author: Marshall Cohen
title: Madison Cawthorn's lawyer argues that states can't enforce age and residency rules for congressional candidates
